games.summary: ORLANDO, Fla. -- —Franz Wagnerscored 27 points,Desmond Baneadded 22 points and seven assists and theOrlando Magicbeat theBoston Celtics123-110 Friday night in their NBA Cup opener.

WASHINGTON -- —Donovan Mitchellscored 24 points,Darius Garlandhad 20 points and nine assists and theCleveland Cavaliersrouted theWashington Wizards148-114 on Friday night to improve to 1-1 in NBA Cup play. Two days after Mitchell scored a season-high 46 points in a home victory over Philadelphia, Garland andSam Merrillled Cleveland to a 76-59 ad...
blurbs: 📋 Bub Carrington (WSH) made just his 5th start this season. 6 pts, 4 reb.
🆕 Tre Johnson (WSH) made his first start of the season. 29 min, 19 pts.

games.summary: ATLANTA -- —Brandon Ingramscored 20 points and theToronto Raptorsrallied to beat theAtlanta Hawks109-97 on Friday night for their second straight NBA Cup victory and fourth overall. Jalen Johnsonscored 21 points for Atlanta, with the Hawks missing All-Star guardTrae Youngbecause of a sprained right MCL.Nickeil Alexander-Walkeradded 20 points, an...

NEW YORK -- —Cade Cunninghamhad 34 points and 10 assists,Jalen Durenadded 30 points and 11 rebounds and theDetroit Pistonsbeat theBrooklyn Nets125-107 on Friday night in an NBA Cup group opener. The All-Star point guard has averaged 29.8 points and 11.2 assists while shooting 54% from the field during the streak.
blurbs: 📋 Noah Clowney (BKN) made just his 3rd start this season. 19 pts, 1 reb.
🆕 Egor Demin (BKN) made his first start of the season. 23 min, 8 pts.
📋 Isaiah Stewart (DET) made just his 3rd start this season. 4 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: SAN ANTONIO -- —Harrison Barnesscored 24 points,Julian ChampagnieandVictor Wembanyamaadded 22 points apiece and theSan Antonio Spursbeat theHouston Rockets121-110 on Friday night in the NBA Cup opener for both teams. Kevin Durantscored 24 points andAlperen Sengunadded 22 for Houston, which had its five-game winning streak halted.

MIAMI -- —Norman Powellscored 25 points and theMiami Heatenjoyed arecord-setting first quarteron the way to a 126-108 victory over theCharlotte Hornetsin an NBA Cup game Friday night, givingcoach Erik Spoelstraa win a day after his home burned down. Miami scored a franchise-record 53 points in the first quarter — the second highest-scoring first...
blurbs: 🆕 Tre Mann (CHA) made his first start of the season. 35 min, 20 pts.
📋 Sion James (CHA) made just his 4th start this season. 10 pts, 2 reb.

games.summary: MEMPHIS, Tenn. -- —Ja Morantand rookieCedric Cowardscored 21 points each as theMemphis Grizzliesbuilt a big first-half lead and coasted to a 118-104 victory over theDallas Mavericksin an NBA Cup game on Friday night.
blurbs: 📋 D'Angelo Russell (DAL) made just his 2nd start this season. 9 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: MILWAUKEE -- —Giannis Antetokounmpohad 41 points, 15 rebounds and nine assists and theMilwaukee Bucksopened their NBA Cup title defense with a 126-110 victory over theChicago Bullson Friday night. Antetokounmpo scored 19 points in the fourth quarter to help the Bucks pull away.

MINNEAPOLIS -- —Anthony Edwardsscored 37 points andJulius Randleadded 19 points, 10 rebounds and 12 assists as theMinnesota Timberwolvesdefeated theUtah Jazz137-97 in an NBA Cup game Friday night. Keyonte Georgeled Utah with 18 points andLauri Markkanenadded 12 for the Jazz, who shot 37.2% from the field and allowed a season-high point total.
blurbs: 📋 Jusuf Nurkic (UTAH) made just his 4th start this season. 3 pts, 4 reb.

games.summary: DENVER -- —Nikola Jokicscored 26 points,Jamal Murrayadded 23 and theDenver Nuggetsimproved to 5-0 at home Friday night with a 129-104 rout of theGolden State Warriors, who were withoutStephen Curryagain. blurbs: 📋 Moses Moody (GS) made just his 2nd start this season. 2 pts, 3 reb.
📋 Brandin Podziemski (GS) made just his 5th start this season. 7 pts, 2 reb.

games.summary: SACRAMENTO, Calif. -- —Isaiah Hartensteinhad a career-high 33 points along with 19 rebounds and theOklahoma City Thunderbeat theSacramento Kings132-101 on Friday night.
blurbs: 📋 Drew Eubanks (SAC) made just his 3rd start this season. 16 pts, 1 reb.
